name: Surviving Eden
description:
Made for the 8 Bits to Infinity Turn Based Jam 2020

In this game, you must explore an ever-growing world full of hostiles. Actions such as defeating enemies, regaining health and upgrading your sword and armour will change the world you have explored during the nightime.

Use the arrow keys to move and harm enemies. After picking up an item, click the slot in your inventory to use it.
